title: Installed TB 115 over previous version rather than from new install
content: Hi I made a mistake. I allowed Norton Software Updater to run the TB 115 as an upgrade, rather than download and install 115 as a new install. It seems to be working fine and I like it but I am concerned that I may get future problems. I don't particularly want to save the profiles and re-install if it is unnecessary. Can you please give me your recommendations? Thanks P.S. I have a small number of errors and warnings in the Error Console, mostly from start-up but they mean nothing to me and there are no obvious issues.

title: Email account does not send from my iphone and does not receive emails on my computer.
content: I set up thunderbird email account on my computer and my iphone. I can only send and not receive emails on my computer account and I can only receive and not send from my phone account. When I try to send emails from my phone the email bounces to my outbox where it sits and I get a message that says "Cannot Send Mail The sender address was invalid" I think something was off in the initial setup because this problem has persisted from the beginning however I cannot figure out how to fix it. Need help please so that email sends and receives from either location: computer or iphone.

title: Creare e caricare modelli su Thunderbird
content:
Buongiorno, avrei la necessità di creare e, successivamente, caricare dei modelli di testo su Thunderbird.

Per la prima parte, ho visto che si può scrivere una mail come bozza e salvarla come modello, ma poi non riesco a capire dove me la salva.

In ogni caso, non ho trovato poi alcuna funzione che mi permetta di "caricare" il modello in un nuovo messaggio di testo.

Questo mi serve perché spesso devo mandare delle mail con un testo predefinito e non doverlo copiare tutte le volte da file esterni sarebbe più comodo.

Grazie
creator: s.barsotti90

title: import csv files as a list

Konkrétně se jedná o tyto meily: jstorkova@bos.de; vlednova@bos.de Můžete mi prosím poradit jak to zprovoznit, aby to fungovalo? Jinak já je do blacklistu nedával. Tak nechápu jak se tam dostali. title: Thunderbird incoming attachment opening issues
content:
Hi,

I recently received a PDF attachment from my customer but Thunderbird was not able to open it.

I had set Microsoft Edge to open PDF by default. I got this error message.

File not foundIt may have been moved, edited, or deleted. ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND

Whereas, if I saved the file to another location and I try to open it (again with MS Edge), there is no problem.

It seems having an "#" in the file name was part of the reason.

I could set Firefox to open the PDF by default but there seems to be disappearing fonts (in some instances) when I open a PDF with Firefox.

Not sure what to make of this but I am posting this here in case someone finds it useful.
creator: kanay.chellapa

title: LOST MY DRIVE WHERE MY PROFILE IS (I HAVE BU FILES)...CANNOT UNDERSTAND INSTRUCTIONS HOW TO FIX
content:
Hi, sorry to ask, but my E drive (where I keep data, etc) died. I do have backup and have the whole Thunderbird\Profiles folder. I watched the YT video, but I don't get it. It should just be easy to point the whole folder to it. All my stuff on C is fine, so it does come up with the email accts and the address book. I did try to do an Import, but got errors. Please Help! I am an OLD IT guy, so I am not stupid. It should be easier than this! I will attach 2 pics. Maybe someone will take pity on me...LOL.

FYI, I use an Over 10 year old W7Prof Installation, migrated thru about 3 pc's, on an i-5 (yes, I am lazy And Love W7) and my 1TB hard drive is over 12 years old (yes, I know...don't ask), And It DIED. So you can imagine what I been going thru since last Sat!!! WHAT A MESS AND BRAIN STRAIN!

Also, I HATE Gmail Web Mail!!!

Oh, and I have donated before. I had Windows Live Mail forever, but when Googley put the OAUTH PW mod in, I had to switch. I do like T-Bird. Sorry to write so much...Thanks again...

THANKS, Sam in FL

title: Thunderbird stopped connecting to homtail after upgrading to v115.0
content: Thunderbird stopped communicating with homtail after upgrading to v 115.0 I can send emails using smtp-mail.outlook.com but it fails to retrieve messages from outlook.office365.com There's no error message, it simply fails to connect. (A pop-up window may appear for a few seconds, then it closes, with no new messages downloaded and no errors shown) I'm using the POP setting. Tried to recreate the account as IMAP - it just shows "checking password", would not proceed any further. (No error message, no timeouts. I tried to enter incorrect password on purpose - still no error message, apparently they don't even connect.) Disabling firewall doesn't help. EVERYTHING WORKED FINE BEFORE THE UPGRADE! PLEASE BRING BACK THE WAY IT WAS!!!
creator: arcadiev

title: How to transfer both inbox and sent emails from Webmail
content: I tried to move my emails from the Webmail 7.0 app, but all that came were my inbox emails. How do I get my "sent" emails—and emails in other folders—to Thunderbird?

title: The add-on "Full address column"
content:
The add-on "full address column" stopped working with the upgrade to thunderbird version 115. I removed and reinstalled the add-on but it did not work. On the older versions, an incoming email would show who it was from and their email address. By knowing the email address of the sender, you could determine if it was a scam or not.

Is there a way to make this add-on work with the new upgraded 115 version?
creator: jizeke
